comments: Also numerators in expansion of hypergeometric series 2F1(1/2,1/2; 1; x).
references: B. C. Berndt, Ramanujan's Notebooks Part III, Springer-Verlag, see p. 91, Eq. 2.1.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
G. N. Watson, A Note on Gamma Functions.Edinburgh Mathematical Notes, 42, 1959, pp 7-9.
formula: a(n) = 2^(-2*w(n))*binomial(2*n,n)^2 with w(n) = A000120(n), the number of 1's in binary expansion of n.a(n) = A001790(n)^2.a(n) = (A056040(2*n)/A060632(2*n))^2. - _Peter Luschny_, Aug 06 2014a(n) = (-1)^n*A056982(n)*C(-1/2,n)*C(n-1/2,n). - _Peter Luschny_, Apr 08 2016
maple: swing := proc(n) option remember; if n = 0 then 1 elif n mod 2 = 1 then swing(n-1)*n else 4*swing(n-1)/n fi end:sigma := n -> 2^(add(i, i = convert(iquo(n, 2), base, 2))):a := n -> (swing(2*n)/sigma(2*n))^2; seq(a(n),n=0..20); # _Peter Luschny_, Aug 06 2014
mathematica: Numerator@ CoefficientList[ Series[ EllipticK@x, {x, 0, 19}]/Pi, x] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 19 2007 *)
author: _Wouter Meeussen_, revised Jan 03 2001
